remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分的行為，包括支援樣板化呈現，透過裝置範本集和內部分頁的行為類似。Much of the behavior of the , including support for templated rendering through device template sets and internal pagination, is similar to the behavior of the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ObjectList 控制項簡介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/527ca783-0ff9-4247-b407-8e58d093faa9)或[分頁](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)文件。For more information, see the [Introduction to the ObjectList Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/527ca783-0ff9-4247-b407-8e58d093faa9) or the [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2) documentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用者定義的類別的陣列，然後再將它繫結物件載入頁面時。The following code example demonstrates how to create an array of a user-defined class and then bind it to an object when the page loads. 它也會顯示清單和詳細資料檢視方式顯示命令。It also shows how the list and details views display the commands. 此範例中，沒有也會顯示的表單清單使用的所有欄位的按鈕屬性。For this example, there is also a button that displays a form with a list of all the fields using the property. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 當定義事件處理常式，項目產生一個事件會透過使用者互動時，通知處理常式。When an event handler is defined, the notifies the handler when an item event is generated through user interaction. 當您使用範本，轉譯的物件清單透過事件反昇機制之 ASP.NET 呼叫事件處理常式。When you render an object list by using templates, the event handler is called through the event-bubbling mechanism of ASP.NET. 此事件處理常式傳遞的型別引數，其中包含有關來源項目的資訊和產生事件的控制項屬性。The event handler is passed an argument of type , which contains information about the source item and the property of the control that generated the event. 這可讓您呈現單一項目具有多個相關聯的互動。This allows you to render a single item with multiple associated interactions. 在預設呈現控制項呈現每個命令定義為連結的物件清單。On default rendering, the control renders each of the commands defined for the object list as a link. 當使用者按一下連結，與類型的引數呼叫事件處理常式，其中包含來源項目的相關資訊。When the user clicks a link, the event handler is called with an argument of type , which contains information about the source item. 中的值屬性是使用者叫用命令的名稱。The value in the property is the name of the command that the user invoked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何捕捉事件。The following code example demonstrates how to trap the event. 屬性會指定要執行什麼動作。The property specifies what action to perform. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks `More`連結會轉譯提供的連結，`ListView`的至`DetailsView`的。The `More` link is rendered to provide a link from the `ListView` of the to the `DetailsView` of the . 必須符合下列條件`More`来呈現的連結：The following conditions must be met for the `More` link to be rendered: - 屬性必須設定。The property must be set. - 必須有額外的欄位或命令，在詳細資料檢視中轉譯。There must be additional fields or commands to be rendered in the details view. 預設呈現顯示的第一個欄位`ListView`連結為`DetailsView`頁面。The default rendering of the displays the first field in the `ListView` as a link to the `DetailsView` page. 設定屬性會覆寫此連結，並與引發它事件。Setting the property overrides this link and causes it to raise the event. 如此一來，`More`連結會轉譯到提供的連結`DetailsView`。As a result, the `More` link is rendered to provide a link to the `DetailsView`. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不相同WAP 瀏覽器所用的屬性。This property is not the same as the property, which is used on WAP browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件引數包含參考的項目和命令的集合。The event argument contains a reference to the item and to the collection of commands. 事件處理常式可以自訂根據項目集合。An event handler can customize the collection according to the item. 應用程式可以使用事件以提供的功能相當於項目特定的快顯功能表。Applications can use the event to provide functionality equivalent to item-specific shortcut menus. 命令的集合，在此事件期間所做的變更不會保存。Changes made to the collection of commands during this event are not persisted. 這個事件之後，就會呼叫事件被呼叫。This event is called after the event is called. 您可以使用此事件，以顯示詳細資料檢視之前執行其他工作。You can use this event to perform other tasks before showing the detail view. 您可以新增、 移除或重新排列欄位，根據清單檢視中選取的項目。You can add, remove, or rearrange fields, depending on the item selected in the list view. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件中移除的項目詳細資料檢視的。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to remove an item from the of the detail view of an . 清單檢視中選取要移除的項目。The item to remove is selected in the list view. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過這個屬性有下列選項列舉型別。The following options are available for this property through the enumeration. |成員名稱Member Name|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| ||這是第一次呈現包含物件清單的頁面時，預設顯示的檢視。This is the default view displayed when the page containing the object list is rendered for the first time. 它會包含標籤的欄位項目，或如果屬性不是空白，對應於表格欄位的資料行的資料表和資料列的項目。It consists of either the label fields of the items, or if the property is not empty, a table with columns corresponding to the table fields and rows for the items. 在 HTML 中，這個檢視結合命令檢視，顯示為超連結，清單下方的命令。In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the list. 在詳細資料檢視的詳細資訊時，會轉譯超連結顯示詳細資料檢視每個項目。When there is more information in the Details view, a hyperlink for each item displaying the Details view is rendered.| ||在 HTML 中，這個檢視結合命令檢視，顯示為超連結，詳細資料如下的命令。In HTML, this view is combined with the Commands view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details.| ||這個檢視只會為 WML 裝置個別呈現。This view is rendered separately only for WML devices. 它包含的命令及功能表。It consists of a menu with the commands of the . HTML 裝置的清單檢視與 詳細資料檢視會每個與結合此檢視中，顯示為超連結，詳細資料或清單下方的命令。For HTML devices, the List view and Details view are each combined with this view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details or list.| > [!NOTE] > 程式碼中設定此屬性，您必須選取清單中的項目才能將此屬性設定為或檢視。To set this property in code, an item in the list must be selected before setting this property to or view. 嘗試選取項目就會擲回的例外狀況之前設定屬性。An attempt to set the property before selecting an item throws an exception. 檢視模式中保存的私用檢視狀態，因此，無論屬性物件是`true`，檢視模式會保存為私用欄位。A view mode is persisted in a private view state, so that, regardless of whether the property of the object is `true`, the view mode is persisted as a private field. 不過，如果屬性是`false`，需要針對每個要求重複的資料繫結的要求之間不會保留項目集合。However, if the property is `false`, the items collection is not persisted between requests, requiring a data bind to be repeated for each request.

exception.span: 嘗試將這個屬性設為 以外的其他值，但並未選取任何項目。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than while no item was selected.
